name: python-group-project-deploy
description: Deployment scripts for Python Group Project

scripts.start-chrome: echo 'Starting Chrome with debugging port...' && /Applications/Google\ Chrome.app/Contents/MacOS/Google\ Chrome --remote-debugging-port=9222 --user-data-dir=/tmp/chrome-debug
scripts.deploy-help:
node -e "console.log('ðŸ”§ Deployment Help:
1. Run: npm run start-chrome
2. In new terminal: npm run deploy
3. Follow the script instructions')"

author: Python Group Project Team
